keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $27,258,838.74 on November 1, 2013.
The account experienced a total of $550,000.00 in transfers to other accounts during November 2013.
The ending balance as of November 30, 2013, was $26,714,393.28.
Interest earned during this period was $5,554.54.
Amanda Kirby is listed as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.
